m_szDocSumamry: New-car gadgetry isn't always so new Hannah Elliott, BLOOMBERG Posted: Sunday, February 7, 2016, 1:08 AM After checking out everything luxury at the Detroit Auto Show last week, I spent some time at General Motors' Heritage Center. The complex is about 30 miles from downtown Detroit and houses 15,000 linear feet of old paper archives. Plus, the multiple warehouses there hold more than 400 cars made at one time or another over GM's 100-year history.
